Salesforce Components - UserSelector
Overview    Classes    Enums    Interfaces    Triggers    SObjects    Groups    Index




Class UserSelector

public inherited sharing class UserSelector

Runs queries on the User object

Change History

06/20/2021 Initial version.
06/20/2021 Methods to get all active users and all user in the given roles.
06/23/2024 getUsersByThirdPartyAuthEmail(): New method to query the User object by third party emails.

Members

  Modifiers and Type Name Description
public static UserSelector.Result
getActiveUsers()
Queries the User object for all active users
public static UserSelector.Result

Queries the User object for a given list of user third party emails
public static UserSelector.Result
getUsersInfo(Set<Id> userIds)
Queries the User object for a given list of user Ids
public static UserSelector.Result
getUsersInRoles(Set<Id> roleIds)
Queries the User object for all users in the given roles

Methods

public static UserSelector.Result getActiveUsers()

Queries the User object for all active users

Returns:
    Result object containing the queried records

Since:

public static UserSelector.Result getUsersByThirdPartyAuthEmail(List<String> emails)

Queries the User object for a given list of user third party emails

Parameters:
    emails – List<String>: User third party emails to query

Returns:
    Result object containing the queried records

Since:
    06/23/2024

public static UserSelector.Result getUsersInfo(Set<Id> userIds)

Queries the User object for a given list of user Ids

Parameters:
    userIds – Set<Id>: User Ids to query

Returns:
    Result object containing the queried records

public static UserSelector.Result getUsersInRoles(Set<Id> roleIds)

Queries the User object for all users in the given roles

Parameters:
    roleIds – Set<Id>: Role Ids to query

Returns:
    Result object containing the queried records
